content: आशंक् {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> {@--1@} To suspect, distrust; दयितां साध्वीं त्वमाशंकिष्वथाः कथं <ls>Bk. 21. 1.</ls> {@--2@} To suspect or believe to be; आशंकसे यदग्निं <ls>Ś. 1. 28</ls>; <ls>Śi. 3. 72</ls>; <ls>Bk. 6. 6.</ls> {@--3@} To be in doubt or suspense; <ls>M. 4. 5.</ls> {@--4@} To fear, be afraid, apprehend; भरतागमनमाशंक्य <ls>R. 12. 24</ls>; <ls>Pt. 392</ls>; दत्तपूर्वेत्याशंक्यते <ls>Māl. 4.</ls> {@--5@} To start a doubt or objection.
